body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value as T0_observation_free_text,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/value as T0_observation_quantity,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0006]/value as T0_observation_count,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0007]/value as T0_observation_ordinal
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.observation_archetype.v0]
  )
LIMIT
  1
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
